long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐛𝐯𝐦𝐝𝐨𝐭𝐬𝐡, a revolutionary Chrome extension that harnesses the power of workflows, APIs and generative AI to automate any task. Say goodbye to mundane, repetitive tasks and hello to exponential productivity.

𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐀𝐧𝐲𝐭𝐡𝐢𝐧𝐠, 𝐍𝐨 𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐞𝐪𝐮𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐝

With bvmdotsh, you can automate tasks across various domains with zero hallucinations and 100% task reliability, including:

- Food delivery and ordering
- Sending emails and mail
- Booking cabs and flights
- Purchasing books and other products
- Summarizing YouTube videos
- Buying and selling stocks after analyzing market trends

The possibilities are endless, and the best part? No coding expertise is required.

𝐋𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐮𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐀𝐠𝐧𝐨𝐬𝐭𝐢𝐜 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧

bvmdotsh breaks down language barriers, allowing you to automate tasks on websites in any regional language. Whether you're interacting with a website in English, Spanish, Mandarin, or any other language, our extension has got you covered.

𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐞𝐫-𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧

As a developer-first tool, bvmdotsh provides an API for seamless integration with your projects. Automate workflows, streamline your development process, and unlock new levels of productivity.

bvmdotsh also allows users to automate a wide range of website actions, including:

- 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐨𝐦𝐚𝐭𝐞 𝐰𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞 𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐬: bvmdotsh can interact with websites just like a human would. It can click, type, and press keys on web pages, making it the ultimate tool for automating web-based tasks.
- 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐚𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐲 𝐰𝐞𝐛𝐬𝐢𝐭𝐞: With bvmdotsh, you can easily extract data from any website, regardless of its structure or format. This allows you to quickly and accurately gather the information you need, without the tedium and errors of manual data entry.
𝐒𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐝𝐮𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐰𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐟𝐥𝐨𝐰: Need to automate a task or workflow on a regular basis? With bvmdotsh, you can easily schedule bots to run at the times and frequencies you specify, ensuring that your tasks are always completed on time and without any manual intervention.

𝐏𝐨𝐰𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐛𝐲 𝐃𝐫𝐚𝐠 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐃𝐫𝐨𝐩 𝐀𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐍𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬 𝐭𝐨 𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐟𝐥𝐨𝐰𝐬 (𝐑𝐮𝐧𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐢𝐧-𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐬𝐞 𝐜𝐥𝐨𝐮𝐝 𝐛𝐫𝐨𝐰𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐬)

Action Nodes
Key: Adds a key action node to press the certain keys, such as Enter, Shift, and Tab.
Click: Adds a click action node to click on the certain element on the webpage.
Type: Adds a type action node to type on forms and text inputs on the webpage.

Tab Actions Nodes
New Tab: Adds a new tab node to open a new tab.
URL: Adds an URL node to open the browser.
Switch Tab: Adds switch tab  node to switch between the tabs.

Data Reader Nodes
Web Selector: Adds a web selector node that fetches all visited webpage selectors on cloud.
Web Data: Adds a web data node that fetches the selected element data on the webpage.
File Reader: Adds a file reader node that reads the content of the file uploaded.
Text Input: Adds a text input node that stores the input data.
 
Control Flow Nodes
If Else: Adds an if-else condition control flow node.
Wait: Adds a wait control flow node to wait for particular seconds before executing the next action within the workflow.
Skip: Adds a skip node to skip certain action nodes within the workflow if condition turns true.
Scroll: Adds a scroll node to scroll on the webpage.
Loop: Adds a loop node to loop the action nodes.

External Interaction Nodes
AI: Adds an AI node to run the LLM model.
API: Adds an API node to call the external APIs.

Quick Actions
Save Task: Adds a save node to save the task workflow in the user's task library.
Run Task: Adds a run task node that runs the task workflow created by user on our cloud browsers.
Schedule Task: Adds a schedule task node that schedule the user tasks.
Reset Task: Adds a reset task node to reset the task workflow created by user.

Once the user creates and save a task workflow, they can run the task via our chrome extension, that runs on our cloud browsers, as well as, can integrate the tasks using task ID within their applications using our developer's API.

bvmdotsh is the ultimate productivity companion, helping you reclaim your time and focus on the things that truly matter. Whether you're a busy professional, a student, a developer, or anyone in between, this powerful Chrome extension is here to help you achieve more, faster and easier than ever before.

𝐈𝐧𝐬𝐭𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐛𝐯𝐦𝐝𝐨𝐭𝐬𝐡 𝐭𝐨𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐞𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐟𝐮𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐢𝐭𝐲.
Facing any issue in creating task workflows, integrating tasks within your application, or any other issues, please reach out to me at 𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐡𝐢𝐤@𝐛𝐯𝐦.𝐬𝐡 / 𝐡𝐞𝐥𝐥𝐨@𝐛𝐯𝐦.𝐬𝐡.
